document.bingtitle: Coca Cola Beverage Dispenser is the Soda Fountain of the Future ...
document.webtitle: Coca Cola Beverage Dispenser is the Soda Fountain of the Future - QSR Magazine
document.description: The Coca Cola Company is testing beverage-dispensing technology that could change the way fast food customers get their drinks.
